metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Karlach chat while wandering FOR

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: Biting flies, midges - shouldn't nature be beautiful and serene? It looks so nice in the Upper City parks.
3.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Upper City, huh? Swish. Never spent much time there myself.
0.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: I'll happily take you. If we survive this bugs' banquet.
2.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Sounds good. I've always been curious what a patriar loo looks like.
1.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).
